mil7.7.4:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘pavanassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.7.4:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paresaṃ aparaddhaṃ khalitaṃ paṭicchādetabbaṃ na vivaritabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pavanaṃ suññaṃ pacurajanehi;

mil7.7.4:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhijālehi sabbehi ca kilesehi suññena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pavanaṃ vivittaṃ janasambādharahitaṃ;

mil7.7.4:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi anariyehi pavivittena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pavanaṃ santaṃ parisuddhaṃ;

mil7.7.4:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena santena parisuddhena bhavitabbaṃ, nibbutena pahīnamānena pahīnamakkhena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ariyajanasaṃsevitena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.4:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.5:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘rukkhassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.7.5:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vimuttipupphasāmaññaphaladhārinā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.5:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, rukkhassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.5:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, rukkho upagatānamanuppaviṭṭhānaṃ janānaṃ chāyaṃ deti;

mil7.7.5:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena upagatānamanuppaviṭṭhānaṃ puggalānaṃ āmisappaṭisandhārena vā dhammappaṭisanthārena vā paṭisantharitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.5:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, rukkhassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.5:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, rukkho chāyāvemattaṃ na karoti;

mil7.7.5:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattesu vemattatā na kātabbā, coravadhakapaccatthikesupi attanipi samasamā mettābhāvanā kātabbā, ‘kinti ime sattā averā abyāpajjā anīghā sukhī attānaṃ parihareyyun’ti.

mil7.7.5:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, rukkhassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.6:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘meghassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.7.6:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uppannaṃ kilesarajojallaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.

mil7.7.6:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.6:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho pathaviyā uṇhaṃ nibbāpeti;

mil7.7.6:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mettābhāvanāya sadevako loko nibbāpetabbo.

mil7.7.6:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.6:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho sabbabījāni viruhāpeti;

mil7.7.6:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṃ saddhaṃ uppādetvā taṃ saddhābījaṃ tīsu sampattīsu ropetabbaṃ, dibbamānusikāsu sukhasampattīsu yāvaparamatthanibbānasukhasampatti.

mil7.7.6:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.6:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho ututo samuṭṭhahitvā dharaṇitalaruhe tiṇarukkhalatāgumbaosadhivanappatayo parirakkhati;

mil7.7.6:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikāraṃ nibbattetvā tena yoniso manasikārena samaṇadhammo parirakkhitabbo, yoniso manasikāramūlakā sabbe kusalā dhammā.

mil7.7.6:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.6:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho vassamāno naditaḷākapokkharaṇiyo kandarapadarasarasobbhaudapānāni ca paripūreti udakadhārāhi;

mil7.7.6:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āgamapariyattiyā dhammameghamabhivassayitvā adhigamakāmānaṃ mānasaṃ paripūrayitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.6:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.7:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘maṇiratanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.7.7:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ekantaparisuddhājīvena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.7:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.7:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṃ na kenaci saddhiṃ missīyati;

mil7.7.7:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pāpehi pāpasahāyehi saddhiṃ na missitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.7:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.7:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṃ jātiratanehi yojīyati;

mil7.7.7:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uttamavarajātimantehi saddhiṃ saṃvasitabbaṃ, paṭipannakaphalaṭṭhasekkhaphalasamaṅgīhi sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmiarahantatevijjachaḷabhiññasamaṇamaṇiratanehi saddhiṃ saṃvasitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.7:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.8:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘māgavikassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.7.8:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appamiddhena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.8:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, māgavikassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.8:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, māgaviko migesuyeva cittaṃ upanibandhati;

mil7.7.8:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇesuyeva cittaṃ upanibandhitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.8:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, māgavikassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.8:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, māgaviko kālaṃ kammassa jānāti;

mil7.7.8:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paṭisallānassa kālo jānitabbo ‘ayaṃ kālo paṭisallānassa, ayaṃ kālo nikkhamanāyā’ti.

mil7.7.8:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, māgavikassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.8:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, māgaviko migaṃ disvā hāsamabhijaneti ‘imaṃ lacchāmī’ti;

mil7.7.8:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇe abhiramitabbaṃ, hāsamabhijanetabbaṃ ‘uttariṃ visesamadhigacchissāmī’ti.

mil7.7.8:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, māgavikassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.9:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘bāḷisikassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.7.9:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ñāṇena uttariṃ sāmaññaphalāni uddharitabbāni.

mil7.7.9:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bāḷisikassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.9:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bāḷisiko parittakaṃ vadhitvā vipulaṃ lābhamadhigacchati;

mil7.7.9:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena parittalokāmisamattaṃ pariccajitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.9:2.3.pli: Lokāmisamattaṃ, mahārāja, pariccajitvā yogī yogāvacaro vipulaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigacchati.

mil7.7.9:2.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bāḷisikassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.1:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kumbhassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.8.1:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āgame adhigame pariyattiyaṃ sāmaññe pāramiṃ patvā na saṇitabbaṃ, na tena māno karaṇīyo, na dabbo dassetabbo, nihatamānena nihatadabbena bhavitabbaṃ, ujukena amukharena avikatthinā.

mil7.8.1:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kumbhassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.2:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kāḷāyasassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.8.2:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yogino yogāvacarassa mānasaṃ yoniso manasikārena apītaṃ vamati.

mil7.8.2:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kāḷāyasassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.2:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kāḷāyaso sakiṃ pītaṃ udakaṃ na vamati;

mil7.8.2:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yo sakiṃ uppanno pasādo, na puna so vamitabbo ‘uḷāro so bhagavā sammāsambuddho, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’ti.

mil7.8.2:2.3.pli: ‘Rūpaṃ aniccaṃ, vedanā aniccā, saññā aniccā, saṅkhārā aniccā, viññāṇaṃ aniccan’ti yaṃ sakiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, na puna taṃ vamitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.2:2.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kāḷāyasassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.3:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘chattassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.8.3:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesānaṃ upari muddhani carena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.3:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, chattassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.3:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, chattaṃ muddhanupatthambhaṃ hoti;

mil7.8.3:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikārupatthambhena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.3:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, chattassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.3:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, chattaṃ vātātapameghavuṭṭhiyo paṭihanati;

mil7.8.3:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nānāvidhadiṭṭhiputhusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ matavāta-tividhaggisantāpakilesavuṭṭhiyo paṭihantabbā.

mil7.8.3:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, chattassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.4:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘khettassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.8.4:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sucaritavattappaṭivattamātikāsampannena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.4:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, khettassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.4:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, khettaṃ mariyādāsampannaṃ hoti, tāya ca mariyādāya udakaṃ rakkhitvā dhaññaṃ paripāceti;

mil7.8.4:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlahirimariyādāsampannena bhavitabbaṃ, tāya ca sīlahirimariyādāya sāmaññaṃ rakkhitvā cattāri sāmaññaphalāni gahetabbāni.

mil7.8.4:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, khettassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.4:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, khettaṃ uṭṭhānasampannaṃ hoti, kassakassa hāsajanakaṃ appampi bījaṃ vuttaṃ bahu hoti, bahu vuttaṃ bahutaraṃ hoti;

mil7.8.4:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uṭṭhānasampannena vipulaphaladāyinā bhavitabbaṃ, dāyakānaṃ hāsajanakena bhavitabbaṃ, yathā appaṃ dinnaṃ bahu hoti, bahu dinnaṃ bahutaraṃ hoti.

mil7.8.4:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, khettassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.5:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘agadassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti.

mil7.8.5:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mānase kilesā na saṇṭhapetabbā.

mil7.8.5:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, agadassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.5:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, agado daṭṭhaphuṭṭhadiṭṭhaasitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sabbaṃ visaṃ paṭihanati;

mil7.8.5:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhivisaṃ sabbaṃ paṭihanitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.5:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, agadassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.6:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘bhojanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.8.6:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṃ maggupatthambhena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.6:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.6:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanaṃ sabbasattānaṃ balaṃ vaḍḍheti;

mil7.8.6:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena puññavaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.6:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.6:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanaṃ sabbasattānaṃ abhipatthitaṃ;

mil7.8.6:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokābhipatthitena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.6:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.7:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘issāsassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.8.7:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, issāso sare pātayanto ubho pāde pathaviyaṃ daḷhaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti, jaṇṇuavekallaṃ karoti, sarakalāpaṃ kaṭisandhimhi ṭhapeti, kāyaṃ upatthaddhaṃ karoti, dve hatthe sandhiṭṭhānaṃ āropeti, muṭṭhiṃ pīḷayati, aṅguliyo nirantaraṃ karoti, gīvaṃ paggaṇhāti, cakkhūni mukhañca pidahati, nimittaṃ ujuṃ karoti, hāsamuppādeti ‘vijjhissāmī’ti;

mil7.8.7:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlapathaviyaṃ vīriyapāde patiṭṭhāpetabbaṃ, khantisoraccaṃ avekallaṃ kātabbaṃ, saṃvare cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, saṃyamaniyame attā upanetabbo, icchā mucchā pīḷayitabbā, yoniso manasikāre cittaṃ nirantaraṃ kātabbaṃ, vīriyaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, cha dvārā pidahitabbā, sati upaṭṭhapetabbā, hāsamuppādetabbaṃ ‘sabbakilese ñāṇanārācena vijjhissāmī’ti.

mil7.8.7:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, issāsassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.7:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, issāso āḷakaṃ pariharati vaṅkajimhakuṭilanārācassa ujukaraṇāya;

mil7.8.7:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena imasmiṃ kāye satipaṭṭhānaāḷakaṃ pariharitabbaṃ vaṅkajimhakuṭilacittassa ujukaraṇāya.

mil7.8.7:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, issāsassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.7:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, issāso lakkhe upāseti;

mil7.8.7:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena imasmiṃ kāye upāsitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.7:3.3.pli: Kathaṃ, mahārāja yoginā yogāvacarena imasmiṃ kāye upāsitabbaṃ?

mil7.8.7:3.4.pli: Aniccato upāsitabbaṃ, dukkhato upāsitabbaṃ, anattato upāsitabbaṃ, rogato …pe…

mil7.8.7:3.41.pli: evaṃ kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena imasmiṃ kāye upāsitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.7:3.42.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, issāsassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.8.7:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, issāso sāyaṃ pātaṃ upāsati;

mil7.8.7:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sāyaṃ pātaṃ ārammaṇe upāsitabbaṃ.

mil7.8.7:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, issāsassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil8:1.1.pli: Iti chasu kaṇḍesu bāvīsativaggapatimaṇḍitesu dvāsaṭṭhiadhikā dvesatā imasmiṃ potthake āgatā milindapañhā samattā, anāgatā ca pana dvācattālīsā honti, āgatā ca anāgatā ca sabbā samodhānetvā catūhi adhikā tisatapañhā honti, sabbāva milindapañhāti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.

mil8:2.1.pli: Rañño ca therassa ca pucchāvisajjanāvasāne caturāsītisatasahassayojanabahalā udakapariyantaṃ katvā ayaṃ mahāpathavī chadhā kampittha, vijjullatā nicchariṃsu, devatā dibbapupphavassaṃ pavassiṃsu, mahābrahmā sādhukāramadāsi, mahāsamuddakucchiyaṃ meghatthanitanigghoso viya mahāghoso ahosi, iti so milindo rājā ca orodhagaṇā ca sirasā añjaliṃ paṇāmetvā vandiṃsu.

mil8:3.1.pli: Milindo rājā ativiya pamuditahadayo sumathitamānahadayo buddhasāsane sāramatino ratanattaye sunikkaṅkho niggumbo nitthaddho hutvā therassa guṇesu pabbajjāsu paṭipadāiriyāpathesu ca ativiya pasanno vissattho nirālayo nihatamānatthambho uddhaṭadāṭho viya bhujagindo evamāha—

mil8:3.2.pli: “sādhu, bhante nāgasena, buddhavisayo pañho tayā visajjito, imasmiṃ buddhasāsane ṭhapetvā dhammasenāpatiṃ sāriputtattheraṃ añño tayā sadiso pañhavisajjane natthi, khamatha, bhante nāgasena, mama accayaṃ, upāsakaṃ maṃ, bhante nāgasena, dhāretha ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.

mil8:4.1.pli: Tadā rājā saha balakāyehi nāgasenattheraṃ payirupāsitvā milindaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kāretvā therassa niyyātetvā catūhi paccayehi nāgasenaṃ koṭisatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paricari, punapi therassa paññāya pasīditvā puttassa rajjaṃ niyyātetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, tena vuttaṃ—
